00021         {

00045         private void InitializeComponent()
00046         {    
00047             UserDataGrid.ItemDataBound += new DataGridItemEventHandler(UserDataGrid_ItemDataBound);
00048             this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load);
00049         }
00050         #endregion
00051 
00052         private void UserDataGrid_ItemDataBound(object sender, DataGridItemEventArgs e)
00053         {
00054             if (e.Item.ItemType == ListItemType.Item || e.Item.ItemType == ListItemType.AlternatingItem)
00055             {
00056                 e.Item.Cells[e.Item.Cells.Count-1].Text = Enum.GetName(typeof(PMTUserRole), Convert.ToInt32(e.Item.Cells[e.Item.Cells.Count-1].Text));
00057             }
00058         }
00059     }
